I have an AllTest class. In that class I have the "public static Test 
suit=
e()" methode where I add my tests.

For users who hasn't installed an IDE I=
 add a main methode:
public static void main(String args[]) throws Exceptio=
n {
 junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}
So they can start the tests on=
 the console. That works great.
But only when I use the textui. It's not po=
ssible to use junit.awtui or 
junit.swingui. It's because junit.awtui and j=
unit.swingui needs a Class 
and not a Test.
Is there a way to start the GUI=
 in the main methode?
